meanings.definition: In a way that is widely liked or accepted by many people.
meanings.sent1: The movie star was popularly known for her kind heart and charitable deeds.
meanings.sent2: The song was popularly played on the radio all day long.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream shop was popularly visited by the neighborhood kids every weekend.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was popularly compared to that of a famous painter.
meanings.sent5: The new restaurant became popularly known for its delicious food and friendly staff.

meanings.definition: By the general public or a majority of people.
meanings.sent1: The popularly chosen candidate won the election by a large margin.
meanings.sent2: The popularly attended event drew crowds from all over the city.
meanings.sent3: The popularly voted song on the radio was a catchy tune that everyone loved.
meanings.sent4: The popularly believed myth turned out to be just a story passed down through generations.
meanings.sent5: The popularly acclaimed artist's work was displayed in galleries worldwide.
